title: Viennese gulasch
description: The people of Vienna love gulasch so much they’ve taken the Hungarian dish and made it their own. The secret is to use lots of onion. If you don't like your food too hot, then reduce the amount of paprika to suit your taste.
ingredients: 2 garlic cloves, grated or finely chopped
½ tsp caraway seeds, crushed in a pestle and mortar
12 turns of the black pepper mill
1.5kg/3lb 5oz shin of beef, cut into 3cm/1in pieces
